wikipedia_page.main: Barry Azzopardi (1947–2017) was a professor of chemical engineering specialising in multiphase flow research. He was a chartered engineer and Fellow of the Institution of Chemical Engineers.

response: * Barry Azzopardi (b. 1947), chemical engineer specialising in multiphase flow research; Lady Trent Professor of Chemical Engineering at the University of Nottingham
*Barry Azzopardi, 70, British chemical engineer, cancer.Professor Barry Azzopardi – Passed away Monday morning the 22nd May 2017
